023package com.restfb.types.instagram;
024
025import java.util.ArrayList;
026import java.util.Collections;
027import java.util.Date;
028import java.util.List;
029import com.restfb.Facebook;
030import com.restfb.types.FacebookType;
031
032/**
033 * Represents a <a href="https://developers.facebook.com/docs/instagram-api/reference/comment">Instagram Comment</a>
034 * object
035 */
036public class IgComment extends FacebookType {
037  private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
038  /**
039   * Whether the comment is hidden
040   */
041  @Facebook
042  private Boolean hidden;
043  /**
044   * Number of likes on the comment
045   */
046  @Facebook("like_count")
047  private Long likeCount;
048  /**
049   * Media on which the comment is made
050   */
051  @Facebook
052  private IgMedia media;
053  /**
054   * Text of the comment
055   */
056  @Facebook
057  private String text;
058  /**
059   * Timestamp of comment
060   */
061  @Facebook
062  private Date timestamp;
063  /**
064   * User who made the comment
065   */
066  @Facebook
067  private IgUser user;
068  /**
069   * User will only be returned when queried by owner of comment. Otherwise, username is the only field that will be
070   * returned.
071   */
072  @Facebook
073  private String username;
074  @Facebook
075  private List<IgComment> replies = new ArrayList<>();
076
077  public List<IgComment> getReplies() {
078    return Collections.unmodifiableList(replies);
079  }
080
081  public boolean addReply(IgComment reply) {
082    return replies.add(reply);
083  }
084
085  public boolean removeReply(IgComment reply) {
086    return replies.remove(reply);
087  }
088
089  /**
090   * Whether the comment is hidden
091   */
092  @java.lang.SuppressWarnings("all")
093  public Boolean getHidden() {
094    return this.hidden;
095  }
096
097  /**
098   * Whether the comment is hidden
099   */
100  @java.lang.SuppressWarnings("all")
101  public void setHidden(final Boolean hidden) {
102    this.hidden = hidden;
103  }
104
105  /**
106   * Number of likes on the comment
107   */
108  @java.lang.SuppressWarnings("all")
109  public Long getLikeCount() {
110    return this.likeCount;
111  }
112
113  /**
114   * Number of likes on the comment
115   */
116  @java.lang.SuppressWarnings("all")
117  public void setLikeCount(final Long likeCount) {
118    this.likeCount = likeCount;
119  }
120
121  /**
122   * Media on which the comment is made
123   */
124  @java.lang.SuppressWarnings("all")
125  public IgMedia getMedia() {
126    return this.media;
127  }
128
129  /**
130   * Media on which the comment is made
131   */
132  @java.lang.SuppressWarnings("all")
133  public void setMedia(final IgMedia media) {
134    this.media = media;
135  }
136
137  /**
138   * Text of the comment
139   */
140  @java.lang.SuppressWarnings("all")
141  public String getText() {
142    return this.text;
143  }
144
145  /**
146   * Text of the comment
147   */
148  @java.lang.SuppressWarnings("all")
149  public void setText(final String text) {
150    this.text = text;
151  }
152
153  /**
154   * Timestamp of comment
155   */
156  @java.lang.SuppressWarnings("all")
157  public Date getTimestamp() {
158    return this.timestamp;
159  }
160
161  /**
162   * Timestamp of comment
163   */
164  @java.lang.SuppressWarnings("all")
165  public void setTimestamp(final Date timestamp) {
166    this.timestamp = timestamp;
167  }
168
169  /**
170   * User who made the comment
171   */
172  @java.lang.SuppressWarnings("all")
173  public IgUser getUser() {
174    return this.user;
175  }
176
177  /**
178   * User who made the comment
179   */
180  @java.lang.SuppressWarnings("all")
181  public void setUser(final IgUser user) {
182    this.user = user;
183  }
184
185  /**
186   * User will only be returned when queried by owner of comment. Otherwise, username is the only field that will be
187   * returned.
188   */
189  @java.lang.SuppressWarnings("all")
190  public String getUsername() {
191    return this.username;
192  }
193
194  /**
195   * User will only be returned when queried by owner of comment. Otherwise, username is the only field that will be
196   * returned.
197   */
198  @java.lang.SuppressWarnings("all")
199  public void setUsername(final String username) {
200    this.username = username;
201  }
202}
